type.description: Identifies this as an ANS operation

operation.description: The identifier of the operation being performed

date.description: When the operation should be considered performed

display_date.description: The RFC3339-formatted dated time of the most recent date the story was (re)displayed on a public site.

story_id.description: The id of the story being operated

revision_id.description: The id of the specific revision that this operation occurs on, if any

editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that are changed in this operation, if any

branch.description: The name of the branch within Story API that this operation occurs on, if any

version.description: The version of ANS this Story is written in

all_published_revisions.description: A map of editions to revisions that are associated with this operation's parent story. Informational only (does not affect operation).
